description:
Learn How 2 Dance - Bachata (beginner) is a comprehensive course teaching you how to dance Bachata and be able to feel comfortable dancing socially. It is a 16 lecture course lasting a total of 3 hours. Each lesson will build on the previous lesson, so re-take lessons if you need more practice before moving onto the next lesson.

This course is a MUST TAKE if you don't want to be that guy/girl standing on the sidelines while all your friends and coworkers are up dancing having fun.

Time to get out there and own the dance floor!
title: Learn How 2 Dance - Bachata (beginner)
